entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Clinton
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:38 AM PST Saturday 28 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. Temperature falling to minus 8 this afternoon. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries this morning. Clearing near noon. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. Temperature falling to minus 8 this afternoon. Wind chill minus 10 this morning and minus 15 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PST Saturday 28 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Clear. Low minus 20.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 20. Wind chill minus 15 this evening and minus 30 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PST Saturday 28 January 2023
